--- title: "Simulation Studies for Methodological Research: State of the Art, Issues, and Potential Solutions" author: "Samuel Pawel & Björn Siepe" date: "2025-04-16" categories: [Simulation Studies, Open Science, Metascience] image: "simstudies.png" engine: knitr comments: false execute: freeze: true description: "Invited talk at the colloquium of the Methods and Evaluation / Quality Assurance Unit at the Freie Universität Berlin and the colloquium of the Statistics & Psychological Methods Working Unit at the University of Münster." cv: pdf1: "Muenster_Kolloquium25-Siepe.pdf" pdf2: "FU_Kolloquium25-Pawel-Siepe.pdf" --- The manuscript associated with the talk is available was published in [Psychological Methods](https://psycnet.apa.org/doi/10.1037/met0000695); an accepted version is available at [PsyArxiv](https://osf.io/preprints/psyarxiv/ufgy6/). ::: {.cell} ::: Find the slides for Münster here: ```{=html}
